ActAn Act for the Substantive Equality of Canada's Official Languages
SubjectOrder Fixing January 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Section 23 of An Act for the Substantive Equality of Canadaâ€™s Official Languages Comes into Force
PrecisOrder fixing January 1, 2024 as the day on which section 23 of An Act for the Substantive Equality of Canada's Official Languages Comes into Force in order to require the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration to adopt a policy on francophone immigration.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2024-0002 Publication Date: 2024-01-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing January 1, 2024 as the day on which section 23 of An Act for the Substantive Equality of Canada's Official Languages Comes into Force in order to require the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration to adopt a policy on francophone immigration.
